PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-02681998-02-240,  ,  ,  CITIZENSHIP, 
PrecisRe-appointment of MICHEL M.J SHORE, of Hampstead, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Convention Refugee Determination Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montreal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour, for a term of three years, effective April 15, 1998.
